Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

As the vision of Rodimus disappeared. She dreamed of the torture that Rodimus 
was going through. It was easing her pain just ever so slightly. All she 
wanted, was another shot at him. Just like the times of dealing with the Autobot 
fembots like Elita-1, Arcee, Chromia & even some of the male Autobots. Just a 
chance... just to get even. 

Feeling Hydras' hand upon her shoulder, she softened just a bit as thoughts 
disappeared, her cheeck barely brushed against his hand, then she turned around 
to look at him. 

"What did you have in mind?" Curious to see if he had a specific plan or was 
playing this delicate game by ear. She would hate to see Blackstorm used so 
terribly. For one, if she know knew her past, if she was treated horribly, may 
force her back to the Maximals... where would that gain them? 

"Perhaps I can take Blackstorm with me on a patrol of sorts. Surely Rodimus 
is bound to track her." She tossed the idea to Hydras. 

--part1_b8.42e175cf.2c269616_boundary
